ref.mixed-citation: World Health Organization . Preamble to the Constitution of WHO as adopted by the International Health Conference. New York, 19 June - 22 July 1946 signed on 22 July 1946 by the representatives of 61 States (Official Records of WHO, no. 2, p. 100) and entered into force on 7 April 1948. The definition has not been amended since 1948. Available: https://apps.who.int/gb/bd/pdf_files/BD_49th-en.pdf#page=7
